channel.title: Copy and past! help!
channel.description:
Hey, I have a problem! When i copy a code from the Moparscape forums it will not note the spaces. Exempel : [code]This is a test code[/code]
If i copy this : This isa testcode
This is very annoying. I need to do all the spaces by my self. I past it on notepad and i tried with notepad++ And it still fail..
Help!

item.title: Copy and past! help!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Wow thank you i vain i. It worked on Google chrome -.- F#ck internet explorer

Read full topic
